summary: This is an email from the DOJ's voicemail system forwarding a voice message to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address. The email itself contains no substantive content about the case, only metadata about the forwarded voicemail.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to SDNY Epstein Victims Contact
events.description: A voice message was forwarded via email to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's designated email address for Epstein victims.

keyFacts: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York maintained a dedicated email address (USANYS.EpsteinVictims@usa.doj.gov) for communications related to Epstein victims as of August 2019.
The DOJ used a voicemail-to-email system (voip.usa.doj.gov) to forward voice messages to relevant parties.
This document is a metadata record showing a communication was sent to the victims' contact point on August 19, 2019, but the actual content of the voice message is not included in this text.
